## Course Syllabus

* Time Series Transformations & Feature Engineering
* Time Series Models (SARIMA, Exponential Smoothing, Facebook's Prophet)
* Machine Learning (Elastic Net, MARS, SVM, KNN, Random Forest, 
CatBoost, XGBoost, LightGBM)
* Deep Learning (Amazon's GluonTS, Torch)
* Automatic Machine Learning (H2O)
* Ensemble Learning
* Hyperparameter Tuning
